img_summary: The image depicts a bowl containing three brown, textured seeds, likely representing Jade Lotus Seeds from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. According to the context, these seeds are classified as "Uncommon" items and are randomly obtained by collecting Jade Lotus plants. They are part of a broader inventory of collectible seeds in the game.
